headline: CRH PLC (CRH) Strengthens Finance Expertise with Patrick Decker Appointment
summary: CRH PLC (NYSE:CRH) is one of the best cement stocks to buy according to analysts. On September 9, the company received a significant boost with the election of Patrick Decker to the board of directors. He joins the company with vast experience in accounting and finance from Indiana University. Decker has previously served as the […]

headline: T. ROWE PRICE LAUNCHES BLUE BOND EMERGING MARKETS STRATEGY TO HELP CATALYZE FINANCE FOR A SUSTAINABLE BLUE ECONOMY
summary: In a significant move toward addressing the world's growing water resource challenges, T. Rowe Price, a global investment management firm and a leader in retirement, and International Finance Corporation (IFC), a member of the World Bank Group, have launched the T. Rowe Price Emerging Markets Blue Economy Bond Strategy (T. Rowe Price Blue)—an innovative investment strategy aimed at catalyzing the corporate blue bond market.

content.title: T. ROWE PRICE LAUNCHES BLUE BOND EMERGING MARKETS STRATEGY TO HELP CATALYZE FINANCE FOR A SUSTAINABLE BLUE ECONOMY
